title: Frame Drop (need help)
body: Basically anytime I use taunt/dance/laugh I get massive framedrop.. This only started today and I don't know why.. I haven't changed anything from the default settings.. Any help?

replies.body:
It sounds like those files may be missing from the League directory, and the game has to livepatch them in to execute them in the game. I suggest running a repair of League's files by launching the client, then hit the ? icon in the corner of the client and hit **Repair**.

Let me know if that resolved this issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EMHTGtPv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-24T03:48:08.790+0000)
>
> It sounds like those files may be missing from the League directory, and the game has to livepatch them in to execute them in the game. I suggest running a repair of League's files by launching the client, then hit the ? icon in the corner of the client and hit **Repair**.
> 
> Let me know if that resolved this issue.

I Repaired, and it doesn't seem to have helped.

Hmmm, strange... that usually does the trick. The other most common solutions for this type of issue usually revolve around display drivers or windows power settings. Our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) should walk you through these other steps.

Let me know if you continue to have these issues after working through those steps.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EMHTGtPv,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-10-24T20:55:49.778+0000)
>
> Hmmm, strange... that usually does the trick. The other most common solutions for this type of issue usually revolve around display drivers or windows power settings. Our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) should walk you through these other steps.
> 
> Let me know if you continue to have these issues after working through those steps.

I went through some of the steps, and it appears to have fixed the fps drops.  Thank you for your help
